name: axiom-ai
description: Complete Codebase Intelligence Platform with MCP Integration

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=services/web-portal" "npm run dev --workspace=services/mcp-server" "npm run dev --workspace=services/search-api"
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && docker system prune -f
scripts.db:migrate: cd database && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd database && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd database && npx prisma migrate reset --force

author: Axiom AI Team
